name: Wisteria (Anass Doublal)
description:
Due to heavy rain, a droplet made its way deep down the ground. Your role is to help it reach the surface in this 2d up-scrolling platformer. The path taken by the droplet is a root system. The latter is composed of platforms to help you progress but also bugs and spikes that kill you. The droplet thankfully has a dash ability that helps it reach the goal. The game features 3 trees whose root systems go from easiest to hardest.

  • Artwork by Emma
  • Programming by Anass and Eoin
  • Game Design by Olly
  • Audio by Jordan
